headline.main: Migrants Scuffle With Police in Milan, Denounce Conditions
headline.print_headline: Migrants Scuffle With Police in Milan, Denounce Conditions

docs.snippet: Hundreds of migrants scuffled with police and briefly blocked a major road in Italy's financial capital Milan on Monday in a protest against their living conditions and their long wait for authorization to seek work....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of migrants scuffled with police and briefly blocked a major road in Italy's financial capital Milan on Monday in a protest against their living conditions and their long wait for authorization to seek work.

headline.main: Target Settles With U.S. on Charge of Race, Gender Bias in Hiring
headline.print_headline: Target Settles With U.S. on Charge of Race, Gender Bias in Hiring

docs.snippet: Target Corp has agreed to pay $2.8 million to settle a U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC) charge that it used hiring tests that disproportionately screened out candidates for various professional positions based on race and gender...
docs.lead_paragraph: Target Corp has agreed to pay $2.8 million to settle a U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC) charge that it used hiring tests that disproportionately screened out candidates for various professional positions based on race and gender.

headline.main: Drone With Drugs, Porn Seized Near Maryland Prisons, Two Arrested
headline.print_headline: Drone With Drugs, Porn Seized Near Maryland Prisons, Two Arrested

docs.snippet: Two men have been arrested for allegedly trying to fly drugs and pornography into Maryland prisons using a drone, authorities said on Monday, the second U.S. prison incident involving drones in a month....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two men have been arrested for allegedly trying to fly drugs and pornography into Maryland prisons using a drone, authorities said on Monday, the second U.S. prison incident involving drones in a month.

headline.main: NRA Sues Over Seattle's Adoption of 'Gun Violence Tax'
headline.print_headline: NRA Sues Over Seattle's Adoption of 'Gun Violence Tax'

docs.snippet: Three gun rights groups, including the National Rifle Association, sued the city of Seattle on Monday over its adoption of a so-called "gun violence tax," a tax on firearms and ammunition designed to help offset the financial toll of gun violence....
docs.lead_paragraph: Three gun rights groups, including the National Rifle Association, sued the city of Seattle on Monday over its adoption of a so-called "gun violence tax," a tax on firearms and ammunition designed to help offset the financial toll of gun violence.

headline.main: Back From Golf Course, Obama Tees Up Renewable Energy, Iran
headline.print_headline: Back From Golf Course, Obama Tees Up Renewable Energy, Iran

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama, fresh from vacation and nine rounds of golf in Martha’s Vineyard, launched into a busy two weeks promoting renewable energy and his nuclear deal with Iran....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama, fresh from vacation and nine rounds of golf in Martha’s Vineyard, launched into a busy two weeks promoting renewable energy and his nuclear deal with Iran.

headline.main: Obama briefed on global financial markets: White House
headline.sub: Obama briefed on global financial markets: White House

docs.snippet: The White House spokesman says the U.S. economy is strong and that U.S. officials continue to urge China to pursue financial reforms. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: The White House spokesman says the U.S. economy is strong and that U.S. officials continue to urge China to pursue financial reforms. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Wall Street's Early Slide Points to Selling Climax, Buyers Jump In
headline.print_headline: Wall Street's Early Slide Points to Selling Climax, Buyers Jump In

docs.snippet: Investors in U.S. stocks have been arguing that a 10 percent decline of the S&P 500 was long overdue and a missing link of a healthy market. The benchmark index hasn't had a by-the-book correction in about four years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Investors in U.S. stocks have been arguing that a 10 percent decline of the S&P 500 was long overdue and a missing link of a healthy market. The benchmark index hasn't had a by-the-book correction in about four years.

headline.main: ‘My Generation Will Never See One Dollar From Social Security’

docs.snippet: “I know that the program will not exist for me,” wrote a reader in response to Paul Krugman’s recent column....
docs.abstract: “I know that the program will not exist for me,” wrote a reader in response to Paul Krugman’s recent column.

headline.main: Liberians Look for Help to Care for Research Chimps
headline.print_headline: Liberians Look for Help to Care for Research Chimps

docs.snippet: Eleven chimpanzees rushed out from the bush and descended from trees to the shore, making jubilant sounds to greet the speed boat bringing food....
docs.lead_paragraph: Eleven chimpanzees rushed out from the bush and descended from trees to the shore, making jubilant sounds to greet the speed boat bringing food.
